Rulings.Base: 1. [FORUM] You cannot activate the effect of "Stardust Dragon" to negate the effect of "Snipe Hunter" as "Snipe Hunter" is not guaranteed to destroy a card at activation.

PSCT.Edison: ① You can discard 1 card, then target 1 card on the field; roll a six-sided die, and destroy that target unless you roll a 1 or 6.
PSCT.Tengu: ① You can discard 1 card, then target 1 card on the field; roll a six-sided die, and destroy that target unless you roll a 1 or 6.
